items.sentence: Who's going to tell Tom they can't do that?
What can you tell us about Tom's allergies?
Was it Tom who told you to call the police?
Tom told us about how much weight you lost.
Tom told me you're the best lawyer in town.
Tom told me you were pretty good at tennis.
Tom promised to tell us one of his stories.
Please don't tell Tom what I just told you.
Maybe Tom can tell us what we need to know.
Maybe I shouldn't have told Tom to do that.
Just tell Tom to hurry up and do something.
I've been told Tom has been in an accident.
I'm not going to tell you until I tell Tom.
How could you tell Tom didn't like his job?
Hopefully, Tom can tell us how to fix this.
Have you told Tom what time the meeting is?
Has Tom told you anything about his family?
Did Tom tell you anything about his family?
I understand Tom had some sort of accident.
Isn't there anything we can do to help Tom?
Tom overpowered the guard and took his gun.
Thank you for taking such good care of Tom.
We've got to find out what happened to Tom.
Tom should be able to answer your question.
Tom asked you a question. Please answer it.
Tom answered the next question on the list.
There are some questions I have to ask Tom.
I need to ask you some questions about Tom.
Has Tom been asking you questions about me?
I'd like to visit the Great Wall this year.
I was at the wrong place at the wrong time.
I need you to do a couple of things for me.
I took the opportunity to visit the museum.
Have you ever seen your mother in a bikini?
When was the last time you wore a name tag?
Tom knew Mary had gone to a private school.
I didn't know what Tom would be able to do.
Tom has been waiting to see what'll happen.
I wonder if Tom was really at school today.
I wonder if Tom really was at school today.
Please pay attention to what Tom is saying.
Tom could've stayed, but he chose to leave.
I don't remember when I last talked to Tom.
I'm looking forward to living in Australia.
We'll be returning to Australia in October.
Let's not get up so early tomorrow morning.
Let's hope that that day is a long way off.
Let's talk about what you did in Australia.
Both Tom and Mary were wearing black coats.
Both Tom and Mary were in Boston last week.
